sentence.Network_en: Mr Clarke has shown himself to be resolutely opposed to compromise.
sentence.Network_cn: 克拉克先生已表示自己坚决反对妥协。

sentence.Network_en: He has turned a resolutely deaf ear to American demands for action.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对美国提出的行动要求完全不理不睬。

sentence.Network_en: He resolutely refused to speak English unless forced to.
sentence.Network_cn: 除非迫不得已，否则他坚决不说英语。

entry.def: If you describe someone as resolute, you approve of them because they are very determined not to change their mind or not to give up a course of action.

example.ex: Voters perceive him as a decisive and resolute international leader...
example.tran: 投票者认为他是一位坚定果断的国际领导人。

example.ex: He described the situation as very dangerous and called for resolute action.
example.tran: 他将形势描述得非常危险，并号召采取果断行动。

sentences.sentence: "she resolutely refused to look at him or speak to him"
"`I will come along,' she said decisively"

auth_sentence.content: Sangare is resolutely herself, and so is Gurtu.

auth_sentence.content: India will go from being resiliently defensive to resolutely offensive.
auth_sentence.res_content: India will go from being resiliently defensive to resolutely offensive.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: India will go from being resiliently defensive to resolutely offensive.

sentences.cn: 他坚决不接受他们的贿赂。

sentences.en: He grumbles at his lot instead of resolutely facing his difficulties.
sentences.cn: 他不是果敢地去面对困难,而是抱怨自己运气不佳。
